name: Smash Bros Dynasty
description:
Here are the controls.
If you want to use a controller, please use JoyToKey

A Smash Fan-game in the works.
I'm doing this for a school project.
I'm serious.

Arrows = move for P1
Z = Jump
X = Reg Attack
C = Special Attack
S = Shield
D = Taunt

IJKL = move for P2
Q = Jump
W = Reg Attack
E = Special Attack
A = Shield
1 = Taunt
